daily_fact: Maya Hawke is embracing a new chapter by selling her charming Greenwich Village apartment, showcasing the vibrant real estate market in one of New York City's most iconic neighborhoods.
topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include a brief suspension of PATH train service due to a suspicious package, ongoing efforts to rescue a worker trapped under a collapsed tower, and a significant rise in violence within city jails, alongside preparations for the mayoral election and various community initiatives.

community.title: Community
community.summary_md:
### Community
